game.title: Embark on the Enchanted Journey
game.objective: Conquer the Crystal Cavern and retrieve the lost artifact
game.description: Embark on a perilous adventure to find the hidden chamber within the mysterious Crystal Cavern. The key to victory lies in deciphering ancient riddles and outsmarting mystical guardians.
game.reward: The legendary Sword of the Ancients, +10 Experience Points

task.objective: Investigate the entrance and find the first clue
task.location: The Ancient Oak, near the village square

task.objective: Solve the riddle at the Enchanted Fountain
task.location: Fountain of Wisdom, in the center of the forest

task.objective: Defeat the Guardian Lizard in the Cavern's first chamber
